title: BingoChain - User Authentication
description: Atala Prisim users want a simple way to log in to various sites so they can control their privacy.
solution: We will integrate Atala Prism as a alternate authentication provider for BingoChain.io to allow users to easily log in.
experience: Our main BingoChain.io site is operational, this proposal is to integrate Atala Prism. Working with Axnosis, we have contact with Atala devs
